item.title: Tech Stocks Drop in Risk-Off Trade Ahead of PCE: Markets Wrap
item.description: Technology stocks dragged markets lower Friday as traders cut risk ahead of US inflation data that may test expectations for the pace of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.
